36 
38 //
39 // Kinematics are templated on state alone and inherit from dynamics.
40 // Kinematics are treated just like dynamics except that they operate directly
41 // in the configuration space of the templated state type and assume that
42 // the control bounds are maximum speeds in each dimension of that
43 // configuration space.
44 //
46 
47 #ifndef FASTRACK_DYNAMICS_KINEMATICS_H
48 #define FASTRACK_DYNAMICS_KINEMATICS_H
49 
50 #include <fastrack/dynamics/dynamics.h>
51 #include <fastrack_srvs/KinematicPlannerDynamics.h>
52 
53 #include <exception>
54 
55 namespace fastrack {
56 namespace dynamics {
57 
58 template<typename S>
59 class Kinematics : public Dynamics<
60  S, VectorXd, fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response> {
61 public:
62  ~Kinematics() {}
63  explicit Kinematics()
64  : Dynamics<S, VectorXd, fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response>() {}
65  explicit Kinematics(const VectorXd& u_lower, const VectorXd& u_upper)
66  : Dynamics<S, VectorXd, fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response>(u_lower, u_upper) {}
67 
68  // Derived classes must be able to give the time derivative of state
69  // as a function of current state and control.
70  inline S Evaluate(const S& x, const VectorXd& u) const;
71 
72  // Since this function does not really make sense for kinematics,
73  // we will throw an error here.
74  inline VectorXd OptimalControl(const S& x, const S& value_gradient) const {
75  throw std::runtime_error("Kinematics: OptimalControl is not implemented.");
76  }
77 
78  // Convert to the appropriate service response type.
79  inline fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response ToRos() const;
80 
81  // Convert from the appropriate service response type.
82  inline void FromRos(const fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response& res);
83 
84  // How much time will it take us to go between two configurations if we move
85  // at max velocity between them in each dimension.
86  double BestPossibleTime(const S& x1, const S& x2) const;
87 }; //\class Kinematics
88 
89 // ----------------------------- IMPLEMENTATION ----------------------------- //
90 
91 // Derived classes must be able to give the time derivative of state
92 // as a function of current state and control.
93 // NOTE! To access the member variables from Dynamics we will need to
94 // use the 'this' keyword (this is a consequence of our template structure).
95 template<typename S>
96 S Kinematics<S>::Evaluate(const S& x, const VectorXd& u) const {
97  if (!this->initialized_)
98  throw std::runtime_error("Kinematics: uninitialized call to Evaluate.");
99 
100  // Make sure dimensions agree.
101  const VectorXd c = x.Configuration();
102  if (c.size() != u.size()) {
103  throw std::runtime_error("Kinematics: config/control spaces not equal.");
104  }
105 
106  return S(u);
107 }
108 
109 // Convert to the appropriate service response type.
110 template<typename S>
111 fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response Kinematics<S>::ToRos() const {
112  if (!this->initialized_)
113  throw std::runtime_error("Kinematics: uninitialized call to ToRos.");
114 
115  fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response res;
116  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < this->u_upper_.size(); ii++) {
117  res.max_speed.push_back(this->u_upper_(ii));
118  res.min_speed.push_back(this->u_lower_(ii));
119  }
120 
121  return res;
122 }
123 
124 // Convert from the appropriate service response type.
125 template<typename S>
126 void Kinematics<S>::FromRos(const fastrack_srvs::KinematicPlannerDynamics::Response& res) {
127  if (res.max_speed.size() != res.min_speed.size())
128  throw std::runtime_error("Kinematics: invalid service response.");
129 
130  // Populate control bounds.
131  this->u_upper_.resize(res.max_speed.size());
132  this->u_lower_.resize(res.max_speed.size());
133  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < res.max_speed.size(); ii++) {
134  this->u_upper_(ii) = res.max_speed[ii];
135  this->u_lower_(ii) = res.min_speed[ii];
136  }
137 
138  this->initialized_ = true;
139 }
140 
141 // How much time will it take us to go between two configurations if we move
142 // at max velocity between them in each dimension.
143 template<typename S>
144 double Kinematics<S>::BestPossibleTime(const S& x1, const S& x2) const {
145  if (!this->initialized_)
146  throw std::runtime_error("Kinematics: uninitialized call to BestPossibleTime.");
147 
148  // Unpack into configurations.
149  const VectorXd c1 = x1.Configuration();
150  const VectorXd c2 = x2.Configuration();
151 
152  // Take the maximum of the times in each dimension.
153  double time = -std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
154  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < S::ConfigurationDimension(); ii++) {
155  if (c2(ii) >= c1(ii))
156  time = std::max(time, (c2(ii) - c1(ii)) / this->u_upper_(ii));
157  else
158  time = std::max(time, (c2(ii) - c1(ii)) / this->u_lower_(ii));
159  }
160 
161  return time;
162 }
163 
164 } //\namespace dynamics
165 } //\namespace fastrack
166 
167 #endif
